text: Ana Lilia Rivera Rivera (born 14 February 1973) is a Mexican politician who is a member of the Morena Party. Rivera was born in Calpulalpan, Mexico. In 2023, she was elected as President of the Senate. In 2018, Rivera was elected to the Senate. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Senate of the Republic (Mexico)
title: Ana Lilia Rivera
